channel.title: Helmet glitching errors.....PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
I have a really big problem on my server.... And that is a graphics error! When you have a helmet on with a a body on, the helmet kind of merges with the head. Now if you don't have this plate body on then the helmet is fine...Here are some pictures. It is a project insanity base. PLEASE HELP!
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/james13troost/help.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae207/james13troost/help2.png[/img]

item.title: Helmet glitching errors.....PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Tehlife Tehlife
item.description:
@Tehlife wrote:

ravekitty:

Add the item id and stats to item.cfg in the data file :3

Why do you post when you don’t have any idea what to do.
OT: It’s client sided, already a tut released on r-s to fix this.

Read full topic
